member.name: T:IlOptimizer.Optimization

member.summary: Gets the parameters available to the optimization.

member.summary: Gets or sets the parameter to use when performing the optimization.

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of methods that were updated by the optimization.

member.summary: Provides methods for stripping the 'init' flag from the '.locals' directive for a method.
